description: This file is a CMake script used to generate a shell script that sets environment variables for a toolchain. It contains a function to create a script that exports compiler paths, flags, linker options, and cross-compilation variables based on the provided arguments and variables.

methods.name: CC_GENERATE_TOOLCHAIN_SCRIPT
methods.description: Generates a shell script containing environment variables for the compiler, linker, and optional cross-compilation variables based on specified arguments.
